response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its immense worth to you, I propose an exclusive offer to acquire this product at a price of $1,200,000. This offer is designed to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction while maximizing the value for both parties involved. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate a successful exchange.", "product_price": 1200000}
